channel.title: Domain Registration on My Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Domain Registration on My Journey

item.title: Create a Free Domain Name
item.description: Tutorial Scenario: Register a free domain at Freenom Signup for a free account at Cloudflare Add a site to Cloudflare Step 1: Register a free domain at Freenom: Navigate to Freenom and create a free account. Select Register a New Domain as show below. Check the availability of a domain name of your choice. In my case, it’s mytunnel. Then, select the free domain TDL Choose the Period for your selected domain.
